messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] It's all Vickisue's falut was: Geraldo
messages.msgSnippet: LOL that was good....(and I like the song, too)  When I saw the subject line, I knew FEAR!  whew... ... It s all your fault that I have this song stuck in my
messages.messageBody:
LOL that was good....(and I like the song, too) When I saw the subject line, I knew FEAR! whew...

Michelle Leifur Reid <pamperedmichelle@...> wrote: On 10/5/06, Vickisue Gray <vickisue_gray@...> wrote:
>
> That's why I joined this page! So I could learn more about unschooling! And I can say that you all are great! I find with unschooling, my son is learning MORE and we've only just begun....
>

It's all your fault that I have this song stuck in my head. But when
I think about the lyrics it sure seems like the Carpenters were
unschooly :-D

We've only just begun to live,
White lace and promises
A kiss for luck and we're on our way.
And yes, We've just begun.

Before the rising sun we fly,
So many roads to choose
We start our walking and learn to run.
And yes, We've just begun.

Sharing horizons that are new to us,
Watching the signs along the way,
Talking it over just the two (or three or five or seven or ten) of us,
Working together day to day
Together.

And when the evening comes we smile,
So much of life ahead
We'll find a place where there's room to grow,
And yes, We've just begun.

Michelle - dating herself (again)





---------------------------------
Do you Yahoo!?
Everyone is raving about the all-new Yahoo! Mail.

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
